original_text: And whosoever will not receive you, when ye go out of that city, shake off the very dust from your feet for a testimony against them.
korean_text: 누구든지 너희를 영접하지 아니하거든 그 성에서 떠날 때에 너희 발에서 먼지를 떨어 버려 그들에게 증거를 삼으라 하시니

sentences.original_text: And whosoever will not receive you
when ye go out of that city
shake off the very dust from your feet
